About me

Hey! My name's Luke Andersen and I'm a junior studying Computer Science Games with a minor in Screenwriting at the University of Southern California (Fight On!).

I specialize in Gameplay Programming, and am also passionate about Game Design and Narrative Design. I have experience collaborating with other disciplines in large-scale game projects, and have written industry-level code with proper documentation and code commenting that follows given style guides.

I have experience working on multiple USC Advanced Game Projects and Thesis Projects, as well as working as a gameplay programmer for Rat Economy (a student-formed game studio at USC) and undergoing a programming/design internship at OmniMegaSuperCorp.
